LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Unleash your inner chef with our innovative app that guides you through delicious recipes, meal planning, and cooking techniques. From novice to pro, we're here to make your food journey extraordinary.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Transform Ingredients into Masterpieces with Our Smart Cooking Companion
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Source the finest, locally-sourced ingredients for your culinary creations
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Follow our easy-to-understand instructions to cook like a pro
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Tailor recipes to your dietary needs and taste preferences
FEATURE_1_BODY: Discover thousands of delicious recipes from around the world, tailored to your tastes and dietary preferences.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Generate automated shopping lists based on your chosen recipes, making grocery trips efficient and hassle-free.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Follow easy-to-understand, interactive cooking instructions with timers and video tutorials for each recipe.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Plan your meals for days or weeks in advance, ensuring variety and nutrition in your diet.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Get smart suggestions for ingredient alternatives based on what you have in your pantry or dietary restrictions.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your culinary creations, exchange tips, and connect with fellow food enthusiasts in our vibrant cooking community.

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Essential tools for your culinary creations
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or need culinary assistance? We're here to help!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our food-making app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Food Making App?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: The Food Making App is your ultimate culinary companion, designed to simplify and enhance your cooking experience with step-by-step recipes, ingredient substitutions, and cooking techniques.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need cooking experience to use this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! Our app caters to all skill levels, from beginners to seasoned chefs. We provide detailed instructions and helpful tips to guide you through each recipe.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I customize recipes based on dietary restrictions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! The app allows you to filter recipes based on various dietary needs such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and more. You can also modify ingredients to suit your preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new recipes added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our recipe database weekly, adding seasonal dishes and user-submitted favorites. You'll always have fresh inspiration for your next meal!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a meal planning feature in the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes! Our meal planning feature helps you organize your weekly menu, generate shopping lists, and even suggests recipes based on ingredients you already have in your kitchen.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Common Questions About Our Food Making App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app help me in cooking?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app provides step-by-step recipes, cooking timers, and video tutorials to guide you through the cooking process, making meal preparation easier and more enjoyable.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I customize recipes based on dietary restrictions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, you can easily filter recipes based on various dietary needs such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or low-carb options, ensuring you find the perfect meal for your lifestyle.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Does the app offer meal planning features?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app includes a meal planning tool that helps you organize your weekly menu, generate shopping lists, and even suggests recipes based on ingredients you have on hand.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I share my own recipes on the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Of course! We encourage users to share their culinary creations. You can easily upload your recipes, complete with photos and cooking tips, to inspire and connect with other food enthusiasts in our community.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 CulinaryCreator. Whipping up delicious possibilities, one recipe at a time.
CTA_BODY: Transform your kitchen into a gourmet haven with our innovative food-making app. Discover recipes, techniques, and inspiration to elevate your cooking game.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from our satisfied users who have transformed their cooking experience
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my meal preparation! The recipes are easy to follow, and the results are always delicious.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've never felt more confident in the kitchen. The step-by-step guidance is like having a personal chef by my side.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From meal planning to grocery shopping, this app has streamlined my entire cooking process. It's a game-changer!
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unleash your inner chef with our easy-to-follow recipes
